casebody.data:
New York Common Pleas,

General Term,

April, 1895.

Present: Daly, Ch. J., Bischoff and Pryor, JJ.

Emil A. Mayer, Respondent, v. The Union Railway Co., Appellant. Appeal from a judgment of the Tenth Judicial District Court. J. Homer Hildreth, for respondent. Matthew P. Breen, for appellant.

Judgment affirmed, with costs.
